fields.summary: IAM (Euare) policy extension no longer works

comments.body: With latest implementation of IAM, such policies are no longer supported. This may be fixable ([~sjones] will investigate), but at this point we may want to document this as a limitation.

Policy now works as expected:

{code}
#
# euare-accountcreate foo
foo	000121642284
# 
# 
# euare-usercreate --as-account foo bar
#
#
# euare-useraddkey --as-account foo bar
AKIAAXUZKQKMVA3MKWFX
gdo05feBzPtfLn2PnVXPkzyStntzhlzvnsiRaVwl
# 
# 
# euare-useruploadpolicy --as-account foo -u bar -p pol -o '{
>   "Version":"2011-04-01",
>   "Statement":[{
>     "Sid":"2",
>     "Effect":"Allow",
>     "Action":"ec2:RunInstances",
> 
>     "Resource": [
>     "arn:aws:ec2:::vmtype/m1.small",
>     "arn:aws:ec2:::vmtype/t1.micro",
>     "arn:aws:ec2:::image/*",
>     "arn:aws:ec2:::securitygroup/*",
>     "arn:aws:ec2:::keypair/*",
>     "arn:aws:ec2:::availabilityzone/*",
>     "arn:aws:ec2:::instance/*"
> ]
> 
>   }]
> }'
# 
# 
# euca-run-instances -I AKIAAXUZKQKMVA3MKWFX -S gdo05feBzPtfLn2PnVXPkzyStntzhlzvnsiRaVwl emi-8c98a5fd
RESERVATION	r-9a981f92	000121642284	default
INSTANCE	i-35cbbb1d	emi-8c98a5fd	euca-10-111-75-120.eucalyptus.g-19-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-10-111-75-162.eucalyptus.internal	pending		0		m1.small	2015-09-30T01:20:33.720Z	one				monitoring-disabled	10.111.75.120	10.111.75.162			instance-store					hvm			sg-b9dff7f6				x86_64
#
#
{code}
